# seasonalbook

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

An R package that supplements “Seasonal Adjustment in R”, an online Book
by James Livsey and Christoph Sax.

The package contains examples.

To install:

``` r
remotes::install_github("christophsax/seasonalbook")
```

``` r
library(seasonalbook)
grocery
#>        Jan   Feb   Mar   Apr   May   Jun   Jul   Aug   Sep   Oct   Nov   Dec
```
